SEARCH
Package Handlers

Class DataValidation

java.lang.Object
Handlers.DataValidation
public final class DataValidation extends Object
This class provides data validation methods for various fields and user data.

    • checkLoginData

      public static boolean checkLoginData(String email, String password) throws IncorrectPasswordException
      Checks the login data for a user.
      Parameters:
      email - the email address entered by the user
      password - the password entered by the user
      Returns:
      true if the login data is valid, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IncorrectPasswordException - if the email or password is incorrect

    • checkData

      public static boolean checkData(String name, String email, String password) throws NameTooShortException, IncorrectEmailFormatException, WeakPasswordException, EmailInUseException
      Checks the user data for validity.
      Parameters:
      name - the name entered by the user
      email - the email entered by the user
      password - the password entered by the user
      Returns:
      true if the user data is valid, false otherwise
      Throws:
      NameTooShortException - if the name is too short
      IncorrectEmailFormatException - if the email format is incorrect
      WeakPasswordException - if the password is too weak
      EmailInUseException - if the email is already in use

    • checkDataDigit

      public static void checkDataDigit(JTextField... fields) throws NumberFormatException
      Checks if the text fields contain only digits.
      Parameters:
      fields - the text fields to check
      Throws:
      NumberFormatException - if any of the fields does not contain only digits

    • checkUserDataBounds

      public static boolean checkUserDataBounds(int age, double weight, int height) throws DataOutOfBoundsException
      Checks the user data for valid bounds.
      Parameters:
      age - the age of the user
      weight - the weight of the user
      height - the height of the user
      Returns:
      true if the user data is within the valid bounds, false otherwise
      Throws:
      DataOutOfBoundsException - if any of the user data is outside the valid bounds

    • getUserFromLogin

      public static User getUserFromLogin(String email, String password)
      Retrieves the user object from the login data.
      Parameters:
      email - the email address entered by the user
      password - the password entered by the user
      Returns:
      the User object if the login data is valid, null otherwise

    • checkCardData

      public static void checkCardData(String cardNumber, String cvv, String name) throws IncorrectCardNumberException
      Checks the card data for validity.
      Parameters:
      cardNumber - the card number entered by the user
      cvv - the CVV entered by the user
      name - the name entered by the user
      Throws:
      IncorrectCardNumberException - if the card number, CVV, or name format is incorrect
